Messages.Author: Cecilia Müller
Messages.Content: Dear students, Also, this semester there will be a casting class. https://moseskonto.tu-berlin.de/moses/modultransfersystem/bolognamodule/beschreibung/anzeigen.html?nummer=30677&version=1&sprache=1 We will have a short overview and safety introduction on Monday, March 11, at 10:00 in EB126, which is mandatory. The class will be held from Monday, March 18, until Friday, March 22. We will start on Monday, March 18, at 9:00 in EB126. The class will be between 9:00 and around 17:00 every day for the whole week.  The class will be held in English. For registration, please send me an e-mail with the filled-out "Prüfungsanmeldung", cecilia.mueller@tu-berlin.de.  We only have 8 places in the class, so the first 8 registrations will be the ones in the class.    The registration must be made by Wednesday, March 6.  If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me.  Best regards, Cecilia Müller cecilia.mueller@tu-berlin.de
